first_translate: fiona,

hangle: 아벨이 오늘 네 소개도 정식으로 할 생각이래?
first_translate: is abel going  to introduce you today as well?
I don’t think so.
he said that would happen next time.
okay...
it’s too bad I won’t get to escort you tonight.
that is unfortunate.
but we did plenty at airelle.
hmph.

hangle: 둘 다 아주 여유가 넘치는 군.
first_translate: you two are quite laid-back about this whole thing.
alright kids, playtime's over now.

hangle: 두 번째 돌멩이, 넌 알아서 굴러가고.
first_translate: the second pebble will roll on its own.

hangle: 첫 번째 돌멩이는 나와 함께 간다.
first_translate: and the first one comes with me.
a pebble...?
yup, here goes the first pebble...
oops...!
did she just trip--
--and fall?!
she almost hurt herself badly there...
thank you both for helping m--
fiona!
watch where you’re walking.
tsk...
until you get used to these heels, hold onto my arm.
now walk properly.
this carriage belongs to us.
gotcha.
by the way, fiona.
I heard you decided to stay here.
has sieg been whispering sweet nothings into your ear or something?

hangle: …친구의 슬픔을 모른 척 할 수 없었던 거예요.
first_translate: no... but how could I ignore his pain when he was crying like that?
but shouldn’t you return home soon?
after all, you have to inherit house haylon someday.
please keep house haylon for yourself.
why do you say such things...?

hangle: 넌 내가 왜 하필 너를 택했는지 궁금해하지도 않는구나.
first_translate: aren’t you curious why I chose you out of everyone else?

hangle: 그야 내가 아벨의 사정을 알고 있으니까.
first_translate: of course not. because I know what abel wants.
as someone from a distant branch of the royal bloodline,
abel hates the current emperor very much.
when the emperor was young,

hangle: 자신을 위협할 만한 혈육은 전부 죽이거나 쫓아냈고,
first_translate: he killed off anyone related by blood who threatened him.
abel’s family were among those victims.
if abel ever has children,

hangle: 그 자식 또한 황실의 핏줄이 되고,
first_translate: then they’ll also carry the imperial bloodline,
meaning they’d still have rights to succession even if their connection is far removed.
to avoid unnecessary conflict,

hangle: 그 이상으로 아이의 목숨이 위협받는 상황을 만들기 싫은 거겠지.
first_translate: or worse yet, putting his child’s life in danger,
fiona.
from now on, your name shall officially become...
“fiona haylon.”
understood...
try sounding more excited.
and...
call me father.
how persistent.
excuse me, ladies.
did you hear that bastard son is making his debut today?
shh, watch your mouth.

hangle: 폐하께서 정식 황자로 임명한다는 소문이 있으니까.
first_translate: rumor says his majesty plans to make him an official prince.
apparently, he’s extremely handsome.

hangle: 어머, 저는 굉장히 험상궂은 분이라 들었는데요?
first_translate: really? I’ve only heard terrible rumors about him.

hangle: 하긴 그 척박한 헤일론에서 왔다고 하니까요.
first_translate: well, he does come from that barren land called airelle.
come to think of it,

hangle: 헤일론에는 강하지만 매우 잔혹한 마법사가 산대요.
first_translate: I heard there lives a powerful but brutal magician in airelle.
I’m gonna kill them all!!!

hangle: 맞아요! 화가 나면 폭풍이 휘몰아친다 들었어요.
first_translate: right! people say storms rage whenever he gets angry.
lady priscilla,
what do you think about all this?
not really sure.

hangle: 뭐가 되었든 일단 보고나서 결정해야 할 일이 아닌가요?
first_translate: let’s see him before deciding anything, right?
e-exactly!
I thought the same thing myself...!
but honestly,

hangle: 안 그래도 최근 하급 귀족의 딸이 성녀로 증명되어 소란스러운데,
first_translate: with news spreading recently about some lowborn lady being declared saintly,
I can hardly stand hearing any more gossip about bastards.

hangle: 떠드는 소리가 너무 요란해 머리가 아플 지경이네요.
first_translate: my head hurts from listening to all this nonsense.
totally agree!
oho.

hangle: 저 청년이 소문의 그 사생아인가 보군.
first_translate: that must be the bastard son everyone keeps talking about.
duke abel haylon is standing beside him.

hangle: 헤일론 가문이 저 청년을 지지한다는 소문이 사실인 모양이야.
first_translate: seems the rumor about house haylon supporting him is true after all.
be confident.
yes, sir.
oh wow! look at him go!
he shines so brightly...

hangle: 프리실라 영애, 저 청년에게 관심이 있으신가 봐.
first_translate: do you take interest in that man, lady priscilla?
n-not at all.
wait, did our eyes meet just then?
an adorable girl looked at me!
nope.
let’s see...
long red hair,
ruled supreme amongst noblewomen,
and plays the villainess role...?
livia priscilla.

hangle: 본인의 욕망에 충실해서 원하는 건 가져야하는 성격인데다가,
first_translate: she always acts according to her desires and takes whatever she wants.

hangle: 혈통에 대한 자긍심과 자존심도 매우 높은 사람이다.
first_translate: on top of that, she holds great pride in her lineage and self-esteem.

hangle: 시그렌을 처음 본 순간부터 흥미가 생겨,
first_translate: since the moment she met siegren, she became interested in him.
she constantly tries to sabotage ennis, the main character,
but ends up getting destroyed later on...
in other words, she’s your typical villainous character type.

hangle: 나와 같은 악역 라인이라 어쩐지 좀 정감이 가는걸.
first_translate: for some reason, I feel sympathetic toward her since we share similar roles.

hangle: 시그렌 말고 다른 좋은 사람을 찾아보는 건 어떠냐고
first_translate: I want to advise her to find another good person instead of siegren.
just how wicked am I...?
ahem
but wait, isn’t this strange?
that woman...
instead of looking at siegren,
her gaze seems fixed solely on me!!!
